historical_inspiration.enigma_machine: German cipher device with rotating rotors that encrypted messages
historical_inspiration.bletchley_park: British codebreaking center that broke Enigma
historical_inspiration.alan_turing: Mathematician who designed the Bombe to crack Enigma
historical_inspiration.ultra: Codename for intelligence derived from broken Enigma codes
historical_inspiration.impact: Breaking Enigma shortened WW2 by an estimated 2 years

meditation: Just as the codebreakers at Bletchley Park decoded encrypted Nazi communications to understand enemy intentions, AUREON ENIGMA decodes the encrypted signals of financial reality - Schumann resonance, market harmonics, collective consciousness - to understand where the market truly wants to go. The market speaks in code. We are the codebreakers.
